resources.string:
ONW system captures Potential Digital Evidence (PDE) specifically images, videos and audio of criminal acts in South African neighbourhoods. This PDE is then available to law enforcement agents.

NB: Videos and Audio should be at most 10 seconds.

\nWhat is ONW?\nONW system is a web application that allows the South African Police Services(SAPS) to download potential crime scene, in form of images, audio, and video that were uploaded by community members in a South African neighborhood to be used for crime investigation.
\nUpload images\nUpload images of crime for investigation purposes.
\nUpload videos\nUpload images of crime for investigation purposes. It is a powerful tool to resolve criminal and other cases investigations.
\nUpload audio clips\nUpload audio of crime for investigation purposes. Audio recordings downloaded from crime-loud repository can help solve various pending cases in a court of law.
\nAssist law enforcement\nBy uploading content to the site, you are helping law enforcement and also helping your community in making a better place by putting away unjust individuals.
